description: round metal silver sputnik bank on a blue pedestal with a white dog wearing a space helmet, looking out the window of the capsule; "Sputnik" is printed on the base in red with pictures of stars and planets
inscription:
Inscriptions

on base, in red: [SPUTNIK / BANK]; on rim around space capsule, in black: [PAT 9650]; around bottom of base, in black: [MADE IN JAPAN PAT.]
title: "Sputnik Bank" still bank
